activities: Focus Worldwide is a global data solutions provider.  We provide our clients consumer and business data in the countries they want to market in.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
personaldata: Focus will not process any data. We function as a data broker. We will not compile or keep any EU data within our systems but we may pass it along from data owner to certified end-user
privacyprograms: Focus Worldwide is a division of Focus USA.  Focus USA, the parent company is an active member of the U.S. Direct Marketing Association (DMA).
